request.description: Create a new user.

Authenticate user and return a token.
(Note: Token implementation is a placeholder).
Retrieve a list of users.
Retrieve a single user by their integer ID.
Retrieve a single user by their UUID.
Update a user's profile.
Delete a user.
Change a user's password.
Create a new account for the current user.
Retrieve all accounts for the current user, with optional filtering by account type.
Retrieve a lightweight summary of all accounts for the current user.
Get statistics for the current user's accounts (net worth, totals, etc.).
Retrieve a specific account by its ID.
Update an account.
Delete an account. It can only be deleted if it has no associated transactions or holdings.
Create a new multi-month financial plan with start and end dates.
Get all financial plans for the current user.
Get a specific financial plan with all its monthly periods and expenses.
Update plan name, start date, or end date.
Delete a financial plan and all its monthly data.
Get comprehensive summary with totals and monthly breakdowns.
Create a month with income and expenses (can start from budget template in UI).
Get all months for a financial plan, ordered by year/month.
Update the planned income for a specific month.
Delete a month and all its expenses.
Add a new expense to an existing month.
Get all expenses for a specific month.
Update an expense amount, description, category, or type.
Delete a specific expense from any month.
Upload a financial statement file (PDF or CSV) for asynchronous processing.
